review: a lovely movie,  whenever i watch it i get a good vibe.  all songs are marvelous.  most of the actors did their job perfectly. the  chemistry between dev (arjun rampal ) and shalu (preity zinta)  is a pleasure to eyes . u can some beautiful locations in the songs.  storyline of the movie is not very strong but still this movie is undoubtedly worth watching.
this was our film industry 10-15years back when lot of good movies used to make. i loved this movie. all the songs are the bests. if you ever fall in love then you will definitely love this movie.
awesome.. after so many years i still think this movie is interesting... in love with all tbe songs specially its title song.. n also the story how shalu thinks of her family first..
i don't know why did this movie failed to entertain people at that time.. i personally feel it's a magnificent movie of itself.. really just love to listen it's song always.. 👌👌
really i relly lov this movie n i always would lov to watch this movie . cause intha a beautiful story behind lady . n the sobgs are too lovely .
